original_title: 沖田杏梨があなたのお嫁さん
overview: You got married to Anri Okita. Bright and beautiful, amazing body. And she's totally lewd... and she's the best bride who loves you the most in the world. Please experience the best life where you can be pestered for sex every day, every day.
title: Anri Okita Is Your Bride
